Title: Before You Go Art Installation
Description: Winner of the $50*000 grand prize! Our team built a 2021 version of a phone booth.  Users can immersively interact with a real phone. The audio has been replaced with a cloud-based dataset of 400+ interviews and clips from around the country. Users can also record their own. Currently being expanded to web and VOIP services.

Title: AI Text To Image
Description: An LA-based design firm contracted me to product manage and build an A.I.* based on the famous dall-e machine by Open.ai.  Using a PyTorch and various cloud-based tools* this project is still in development and involves a tech team that spans from California to Barcelona.

Title: Planes Logistics ERP
Description: Planes handles global shipping and logistics and pulls from over 70*000 unique vendors and shippers across dozens of warehouses.  The team has contracted me to build a new ERP-related service that essentially allows shipment tracking throughout their system. This was a full-stack project and required SQL knowledge* ORMs and a very strong knowledge of React.js
Tags: Prisma | SQL | React | Express.js | REST | JWT

Title: Realtime Messaging App
Description: Exhibitors at a virtual event wanted a way to communicate with one another.  We solved this by creating a real time chat application where attendees can ask questions and conversations can happen in real time.

Title: Realtime Donation Tracker
Description: For a live event* the client wanted to get second-by-second information for donation data coming in.  By using SSE protocols* I worked with the team to build a react app that tracks donations.  We raised over $4 Million!

Title: Glassroom eCommerce Site
Description: An art studio was looking to leverage their existing business and create a website built on top of the powerful Shopify API to create a fast* app-like site that is interactive and feature-rich.  We were really happy with the result.

Title: Cleanlites Order Form
Description: This is a very complex order form that does not transfer easily to a computer setting.  In line with helping the company integrate with their CRM software* we worked to make this order form accessible and extensible.

Title: Covid-19 Data Viz
Description: Since the outbreak of Covid-19 NY magazine has been tracking sentiment. Using a combination of node.js* a little Python and mostly vanilla javascript* we vizualized the data in compelling ways.

Title: Lighting Style Quiz
Description: This quiz was made for an application I am working on that brings lighting designers to your house without needing in-person consultations.

Title: Sleepy Bee Menu
Description: Restaurant owners wanted an interactive way to engage with their menu especially during Covid-19* where physical menus are out of the question.  They can update the menu anytime through a live back end.

Title: JS Drum Machine
Description: I am trying to learn everything there is to know about the Javascript engine.  Part of this was having some fun with the audio buffer.

Title: Flashcard Study App
Description: This was a capstone project for my tech bootcamp.  We made an interactive game that builds and stores study decks and cards.
